resources.string: CREATE TABLE EventList ( EVENT_ID INT PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL, EVENT_NAME VARCHAR(127) NOT NULL, NOTIFY INT DEFAULT 0, _DATE INT DEFAULT 0, VENUE VARCHAR(127), _DESCRIPTION VARCHAR(1024), IMAGE_URL VARCHAR(255), END_DATE INT DEFAULT 0, RULES VARCHAR(1024), MIN_USER INT DEFAULT 0, MAX_USER INT DEFAULT 0, PDF VARCHAR(255) );

CREATE TABLE Exhibition ( EVENT_ID INT PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL, EVENT_NAME VARCHAR(127) NOT NULL, NOTIFY INT DEFAULT 0, _DATE INT DEFAULT 0, VENUE VARCHAR(127), _DESCRIPTION VARCHAR(1024), IMAGE_URL VARCHAR(255), AUTHOR VARCHAR(127), PDF VARCHAR(254) );
CREATE TABLE Coordinator ( NAME VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, EVENT_ID INT DEFAULT 0, EMAIL VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, MOBILE VARCHAR(15), DESIGNATION VARCHAR(255) );
